info.name: Steamgifts Dark
info.description: This was inspired by both Void and Dark Steamgifts. Its compatible with Steamgifts Plus.
info.additionalInfo:
Feel free to fork this on github https://github.com/tr4656/SGUserstyle

Known Problems: 
Steamgifts Plus endless scroll with list view has styling problems after page one.


Version 0.5 Beta

Credits: style 88786 and style 53779

Changelog

<u>0.5</u>
All SquashedPotatoe's changes which make Chrome and Firefox work the same.
<u>0.4</u>
Merged in SquashedPotatoe's changes
<u>0.3 Beta</u>
More bug fixes
Merged in Efreak's changes which makes more things dark (on Chrome)
<u>0.2 Beta</u>
Many bug fixes
<u>0.1 Beta</u>
First version
